hero.title: Hi, I'm Camilo Pavas
hero.subtitle: Software developer
hero.description: Technology in Software Development in training, currently studying fifth semester. I have skills in the development of software, cybersecurity, web development and algorithms design. With experience working with programming languages ​​such as Java (using Netbeans), HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Python. Management the Microsoft Office package in its 2010, 2016 and 2019 versions (Word, PowerPoint, Excel and Publisher)..
